    • Method Detail

      • round

        public Card[] round()
        The round() method simulates a round of war.
        Returns:
        An array of cards played during the round, where the first half orignated from the player

      • checkForWinner

        public int checkForWinner()
        The checkForWinner() method checks if there is a winner.
        Returns:
        1 if the player has won, -1 if the computer has won, 0 if there is no winner yet

      • getCardSpread

        public int[] getCardSpread()
        The getCardSpread() method returns the amount of cards the player and computer have remaining.
        Returns:
        A two element array containing the card spread where the first element is the player's cards

      • getRoundCount

        public int getRoundCount()
        The getRoundCount() method returns the number of rounds that have been played.
        Returns:
        The round count

        The toString() method returns a formatted string showing the card spread and the number of rounds played.
